Title: Minority Report
Writer: Philip K. Dick (short story), Scott Frank (screenplay), Jon Cohen (screenplay)
Actors: Tom Cruise, Max von Sydow, Steve Harris, Neal McDonough
Plot: In a future where a special police unit is able to arrest murderers before they commit their crimes, an officer from that unit is himself accused of a future murder.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 20 wins & 90 nominations.
Production: DreamWorks SKG, Twentieth Century Fox, Cruise-Wagner Productions, Amblin Entertainment, Blue Tulip
